short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens the "What's the Salary?" website with a Seek job URL prefilled

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the user is on a SEEK job page (NZ or Australia) e.g. https://www.seek.co.nz/job/03211328 or https://www.seek.com.au/job/03211328 and clicks the extension icon it copies the URL of the SEEK job page, opens a new tab showing the "What's the Salary?" website (https://www.whatsthesalary.com/), and inserts the copied URL into the job URL field. This saves copying and pasting the job URL into the "What's the Salary?" website.
